org.mini2Dx.core.graphics

Class Animation<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.Animation<T>

  • public class Animation<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite>
extends Object
    Implements an animation with frames of variable or fixed duration
    Author:
    Thomas Cashman

    • Method Detail

      • addFrame

        public void addFrame(T frame,
            float duration)
        Adds a frame to the animation
        Parameters:
        frame - The frame to be added
        duration - The duration of the frame in seconds

      • removeFrame

        public void removeFrame(int index)
        Removes a frame from the animation
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the frame to be removed

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Restarts the animation. This is the equivalent to setting the current frame index to zero

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Updates the animation
        Parameters:
        delta - The time in seconds since the last update

      • draw

        public void draw(Graphics g,
        float x,
        float y)
        Draws the current frame of the animation
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context available for rendering
        x - The x coordinate to render at
        y - The y coordinate to render at

      • getFrame

        public T getFrame(int index)
        Returns the frame at a given index
        Parameters:
        index - The frame's index
        Returns:
        Null if there is no frame image

      • getCurrentFrame

        public T getCurrentFrame()
        Returns the T of the current frame
        Returns:
        Null if there is no frame image

      • getNumberOfFrames

        public int getNumberOfFrames()
        Returns the total number of frames in this animation
        Returns:
        A value greater than or equal to 0

      • getCurrentFrameIndex

        public int getCurrentFrameIndex()
        Returns the index of the current frame
        Returns:
        A value greater than or equal to 0

      • isLooping

        public boolean isLooping()
        Returns if the animation is looping
        Returns:
        True if the animation is looping

      • setLooping

        public void setLooping(boolean looping)
        Sets if the animation should loop
        Parameters:
        looping - False if the animation should stop when it reaches the last frame
